extendedInfo.description: Fast paced TENNIS action comes to your phone and tablet. Use the touchscreen to perform smashes and side shots. Take out multiple opponents and become the world tennis champion!Follow up to the hit mobile sports game Virtual Table Tennis 3D.Features:* Face 12 countries with varying skill levels* Realistic 3D graphics* Intuitive touch screen controls* Vibration force feedback (accessible via options)IMPORTANT NOTE:The extra permissions are required for the ads.Please rate the game if you like it. Positive feedback will help support development. Thanks!

reviews.title: If you are watching this,you must download and play
reviews.comment: Nice one.very good for time pass and also pretty interesting as the ball can be hit at different areas by using different appropriate portions of the racket, thats realistic
reviews.author: Utsav Ghosh

reviews.title: Awesome game for tennis lovers
reviews.comment: I fell in love with this game and its great with its 3d feature! Must play it once to know it!
reviews.author: Subodh Shah

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Hi I am a 12 year old kid and i play tennis abuot 5 times a week and i love tennis and this app. There are a few things I would change though. I would have a difficulty option and a choose u player option. But overall it is pretty good

reviews.title: Screen turns black
reviews.comment: Each time I try to open it the screen turns black and it says\" play tennis not responding\" do fix this in new update.
reviews.author: aaizah ali

reviews.title: Table tennis game in disguise
reviews.comment: This is the same as the table tennis games but on a tennis court.  The ball just bounces till you hit it to serve, rackets don\'t swing, they just block and thrust, no option for different shots, shots just land in the service box, and you don\'t even have a character.  Funny how people say this is realistic and feels like tennis.
reviews.author: Tom Fearon

reviews.title: Tennis
reviews.comment: It\'s an awesome game a lot of time to play. Wish it had more levels. I play every day.

reviews.comment: Very easy to pick up and great sensativity on the controls! Responds well! Highly recommended for hours of zoning out!\tGet it all you Nadal, Federer, and Jochavik fans!;
